Yes i concur - the first season (except last ep) is a bit boring - but then you get into it and you're stuck :D 
a great thing about all TPB (except first season the boring episodes) is that you can watch them over and over again and they are still funny :)

so that's what I do inbetween the new episodes :D

I've never seen a series in the same category/gengre - do you know any?
